content: We have several key customer wins in the quarter, within Hospitality, our newly released flagship platform Lightspeed Restaurant secured a contract for over 200 Restaurant locations in Germany, which includes both the POS and Payments. Your line is open. I think the thing that are under our control, we feel really good about that we are going to continue to grow the customer base penetrate payments, as you mentioned, we are now available in new markets and off to a good start in Europe where we recently launched.
